The **Yeoman Warder** is the [Yeoman](/wiki/Yeoman "Yeoman") [quest guardian](/wiki/Quest_guardian "Quest guardian"). Like Yeomen, they are slightly slower than average, but are otherwise unremarkable.
html:
Yeoman Warder

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Wikipedia has an article about:
Yeoman Warder
@ Yeoman Warder
Difficulty 7
Attacks Weapon 1d6, Weapon 1d6
@ Yeoman Warder
Difficulty 7
Attacks

Weapon 1d6, Weapon 1d6

Base level 5
Base experience 66
Speed 10
Base AC 10
Base MR 10
Alignment 3 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) Not randomly generated
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A Yeoman Warder:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line5465

The Yeoman Warder is the Yeoman quest guardian. Like Yeomen, they are slightly slower than average, but are otherwise unremarkable.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Yeoman_Warder&oldid=148824"

The '''Yeoman Warder''' is the [[Yeoman]] [[quest guardian]].  Like Yeomen, they are slightly slower than average, but are otherwise unremarkable.

[[Category:SLASH'EM monsters]]
